application.doc: Retrieve a list of MMFA transactions

param.name: appliance_hostname
param.doc: Host name of the appliance.

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieve a list of MMFA transactions
method.doc: To retrieve information on MMFA transactions issue an HTTP GET command on the mmfa-transactions resource URI.

request.doc:
Retrieve a list of transactions:
GET https://{appliance_hostname}/iam/access/v8/mmfa-transactions/

param.name: Authorization: Basic
param.doc: Basic authentication header.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service.

param.name: Content-Range:items n-nn/nnn
param.doc: Indicates which records out of the total number of records were returned in a format similar to the following example: items 0-49/100.

param.name: Content-Type:application/json
param.doc: Response is in JSON formatting.

representation.name: transactionsJsonResponse
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: id
param.doc: The id of the transaction.

param.name: username
param.doc: The username of the user who triggered the transaction.

param.name: creationTime
param.doc: The time when the transaction was created.

param.name: lastActivityTime
param.doc: The time when the transaction was last modified.

param.name: authnPolicyURI
param.doc: The Verify Identity Access AAC authentication policy URI to be completed for the transaction.

param.name: requestUrl
param.doc: The Verify Identity Access AAC authentication policy URL to be invoked for this transaction.

param.name: authnPolicyAction
param.doc: The HTTP verb to used to invoke the policy URL.

param.name: txnStatus
param.doc: The completion state of the transaction. One of "pending", "success" or "fail".

param.name: attributes
param.doc: Array of attributes associated with the transaction.

param.name: name
param.doc: The name of the attribute.

param.name: dataType
param.doc: The datatype of the attribute. One of "String", "Double", "Date", "Time", "Integer", "X500Name" or "Boolean".

param.name: issuer
param.doc: The Verify Identity Access URI of the issuer of the attribute.

param.name: uri
param.doc: The Verify Identity Access URI of the attribute.

param.name: value
param.doc: The value of the attribute.

param.name: id
param.doc: The ID of the attribute value.

param.name: values
param.doc: The values of the attribute.

response.doc: Bad Request. There is a problem with the request. The JSON result describes the problem.

param.name: Content-Type:application/json
param.doc: Response is in JSON formatting.

param.name: result
param.doc: The error message.

response.doc: Not Found. The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.

param.name: Content-Type:application/json
param.doc: Response is in JSON formatting.

param.name: result
param.doc: The error message.

response.doc: An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

param.name: Content-Type:application/json
param.doc: Response is in JSON formatting.

param.name: result
param.doc: The error message.
